1.content: Enhanced Product Recommendation Engine for AI Chat
1.details: Integrate advanced recommendation algorithms into existing AI chat system: 1. Complementary item suggestions (ties with suits, shoes with outfits), 2. 'Customers also bought' analytics, 3. Occasion-based outfit recommendations, 4. Cross-category upselling logic, 5. Integration with existing size/style/customer service bots

2.details: Build visual search capabilities: 1. Image upload interface for 'find similar items', 2. AI-powered image analysis for color/pattern/style matching, 3. Visual similarity scoring system, 4. Integration with product database, 5. Smart search filters combining visual + text search
